casebody.data:
In Re DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE, et al., petitioners. No. 18-557. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 6, 2018.

The respondents are directed to file a response to the petition on or before 5 *476p.m., Tuesday, November 13, 2018. Petitioners may file a reply brief on or before 2 p.m., Thursday, November 15, 2018. Amicus curiae briefs may be filed on or before 5 p.m., Tuesday, November 13, 2018.
